snippet: As a result, Eurosport International ... was taken over by RTL II. In May 2000, ESPN sold its shares of Eurosport to TF1 and Canal+. In January 2001, TF1 took full ownership of Eurosport....

title: Eurosport 1 - Wikipedia
snippet: Discovery. Discovery took a 20% minority interest share in December 2012, and became majority shareholder in the Eurosport venture with TF1 in January 2014, taking a 51% share of the company, On 22 July 2015 Discovery agreed to acquire TF1's remaining 49% stake in the venture.

title: Eurosport
snippet: The rebrand follows Discovery’s acquisition of Eurosport which after it bought a majority stake in the sports destination in May 2014 and was completed in a €491m deal in October 2015.
